post.body: cool, I'm working a private party from 9pm - 2am downtown in Tribeca for a art dealer. Made this connect at Cipriani's.
I only look forward to checkin my mail when I'm expecting a check! Other than that, it's JUNK or BILLs!
My Bad... sheez, I left you around 1:30am... I'm such a BAD Influence ;) That's WHY You Get paid the Mega $$$
Whut UP Andro! Fellas, Sax gets out of work 7pm, WE're all hookin up Florios. Lance, Im havin lunch 57st @Le Park Meridian around 2pm, Holla
Yeah, Lance, Im not the only promoter in NYC! But, Chris is right, life is ALL About NETWORKING! Yes, I'm YOUR Friend, but it helps US all.
ONLY PROBLEM is... it's for today @1pm!!!!! I can't make IT :( WHO checks their mail on the regular?? Why didn't they just email me?? Dag ;(
damn,Im just checkin my freakin mail (actual mail) over a wk later & just realized they mailed me a invite for the NEW Biggie movie screenin
Asian Chris, 3.5hrs of sleep, damn the strippers weren't that HOT Looking! LoL -Mr Sax, ARE WE meeting @Florios today for your Bday cigars?
Yes... it's a GREAT Burger. Check out menu: http://www.parkermeridien.com/eat4.php
In the mood for a GREAT CheeseBurger... Hittin up '''The Burger Joint"" at the Park Meridien Hotel (57th St btw 6th & 7th Ave) around 2pm!
doesn't understand why I naturally get up only after 5hrs of sleep? I have No Need to be up already. Anyways, Hope Everyone Has a GREAT Day!
Damn, just realized it's going to be in the mid 60's today, Sunday and a friend from Florios had a spare ticket to the Jets vs Miami game!!!
back @the cave,that's what SOMEONE called my crib because U could freakin' sleep all day w/o the sun botherin U,IT's CALLED HEAVY CURTAINS!
Asian Chris take it easy!! No need to spinning out... it's just a club... just a girl... just a drink! Ry*EventsRL
is bouncin out the door... GuestHouse & HOME (27th St btw 10&11AVE) Ladies FREE all Night at both clubs, Mention Ryan, EventsRL at the door!
MR Sax... YOU Missed a GREAT Freakin Party last night @FROG. So GREAT... I didn't get to sleep till about 11am! LoL
Yes My Twits... Normally WE have MAD fun on Saturdays @GuestHouse... but 2nite, WE're doing it up EVEN MORE... Marc Saks freakin BDAY party!
is feelin GOOOOD, just finished chowin down on sum yummy Thai Food! Resting up for 2nite's Frolickin @HOME & GuestHouse. Hit Me Up for RSVP.
SEE Lance, Gab is watching quality cinema! I love movie posters on IMDB & the TagLines, sheez, I what to see it RIGHT NOW, must download!
ok MY Twits... don't care if you're in Prague,Uptown,Queens,Upstate, NJ... WE're Rockin OUT 2nite at FR.OG, 71 Spring St & DONT Show Up 2am!
